https://tmrev.io/movie/119398-Bu単uel in Hollywood 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hJBvlqzh0olllPVlDj8Aawrlhnw.jpg This documentary traces the relationship of Bu単uel with American culture and Hollywood. The program proposes a chronological journey through the Aragonese filmmaker stays in the U.S., the characters he met, the films he made and he could never do. The program also includes new material-unpublished until 2012 - the Aragonese director filmed in the U.S. in the early 1940s and where he can be seen playing one of their children or enjoying a short holiday in a cottage. Bu単uel in Hollywood
